author: Odeinoichus
title: Notoriously Evil Lava Monster
review:
Set #70338 Ultimate General Magmar: Here is the cheapest set to feature one of the main Lava Monster villains. This is one of the big recommendations for the set because the General is a great looking figure and he comes with some nice evil looking powers.

Packaging

Functional and does a decent job of showcasing the contents of the set. This packaging is pretty uniform and I think I’ve covered enough so far in the previous reviews.

Minifigure

General Magmar: This Ultimate version of General Magmar is a highly detailed treat of a Minifigure. The Lava Monsters really stand out to me and I’m pleased that they were the first year enemies. Magmar features a double-sided torso with hardened magma-like detailing in his print, his legs feature printing as well with three clawed toes on each foot. His head is double-sided with a menacing expression on one side and the back features added detailing for his skin.

His head piece consists of the ponytail element used by Macy, this time in black and a new neck bracket based piece that gives him a large grilled mouth protector. Overall a solid figure and a great leader for the Lava Monster army.

The Nexo Powers & Display Stand

Rock Ripper: This power features a large pair of saw blades built and attached to Magmar’s back, his weapon used is a serated looking blade in translucent red that may or may not be from Ninjago, I’m not sure, think it’s new. The NEXO Power print depicts a spinning saw and some rock fragments, an interesting little print.

Whirlwind: Changing the orange blades to blue Whirlwind features a spinning storm of axes printed on the NEXO Power element, indicating that this weapon is a real danger. He still uses the same bladed weapon.

Mightiness: Featuring a printed NEXO Power of a Lava Monster extending a massive fist, Magmar can keep the original saw-blades on his back or remove them and uses a double-sided fist weapon which I presume enhances his strength. This features the small fist accessories in brown, an interesting weapon design.

The display stand has a great functional look and is really repetitive in the build since every Lava Monster stand looks the same and uses the exact same pieces.

Overall opinion

This is the cheapest method for obtaining General Magmar and features some decent parts. I’d recommend it for those reasons alone, the NEXO Powers are also a big deal, and if you’re following along with the App you’ll want as many abilities as you can get. I do wish there was just a bit more with these sets to make different backpack weapons for all of the variant abilities, which is a complaint I have for most of these Ultimate sets.
